description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up

description:
Reform UK has reported Channel 4 to the police for "electoral interference" over the secret filming of a "planted" racist activist. The activist himself says he is "glad" and that the "truth will come out in the papers".

The post Reform Reports Channel 4 to Police for “Electoral Interference” Over “Planted” Racist Activist – the Activist Says He is “Glad” and “The Truth Will Come Out in the Papers” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Reform Reports Channel 4 to Police for “Electoral Interference” Over “Planted” Racist Activist – the Activist Says He is “Glad” and “The Truth Will Come Out in the Papers”

description:
It's been a painful four years watching the experts, backed by power, dismantle the good life, and yet not be held accountable for the results, says Jeffrey Tucker. And it's only getting worse – but there is hope.

The post It’s Darkest Before Dawn appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: It’s Darkest Before Dawn

description:
J.K. Rowling has slammed Doctor Who star David Tennant following his pro trans speech at an LGBT awards ceremony because he said trans critics were a "tiny bunch of little whinging f***ers" who will "all go away soon".

The post J.K. Rowling Slams David Tennant for Calling Trans Critics “a Tiny Bunch of Little Whinging F***ers” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: J.K. Rowling Slams David Tennant for Calling Trans Critics “a Tiny Bunch of Little Whinging F***ers”

description:
Keir Starmer’s planned VAT raid on private schools is likely to breach human rights law because it singles out private education for the levy, a senior lawyer has said. The Left gets entangled in its own Blob.

The post Labour’s Private School Tax Raid “Likely Illegal” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour’s Private School Tax Raid “Likely Illegal”

description:
This Pride month, why are some historical figures being falsely 'outed' as gay but not others, asks Steven Tucker. Activists rightly reject revisionism about 'gay Hitler', but less genocidal figures aren't so lucky.

The post Heil Homo Hitler! This Pride Month, Why Are Some Historical Figures Being Falsely ‘Outed’ as Gay But Not Others? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Heil Homo Hitler! This Pride Month, Why Are Some Historical Figures Being Falsely ‘Outed’ as Gay But Not Others?

description:
Germany's Foreign Office has been caught pressuring embassy officials to grant entry visas to thousands of fake refugees with forged passports. Eugyppius opens a window on how the mass migration sausage is made.

The post German Foreign Office Pressured Embassy Officials to Grant Visas to Thousands of ‘Refugees’ With Forged Passports appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: German Foreign Office Pressured Embassy Officials to Grant Visas to Thousands of ‘Refugees’ With Forged Passports
